item.title: Re-establishing the link between Hugo and Github
item.author: dajhub
item.description: This post assumes you have already built a site using Hugo, that you have a local version of your site and are pushing changes to Github where it is being hosted. I am fairly new to GitHub so when changing computers I was a little uncertain on how to re-establish the link with GitHub. The following are the steps I went through. Background Here is some additional information on my set-up.
